Traits.Name: Pack Instincts
Traits.Content: Melonheads gain advantage on attack rolls against creatures within 5 feet of an ally.

Traits.Name: Uncanny Stare
Traits.Content: A creature that meets a Melonhead's gaze must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Quick Ambush
Traits.Content: Melonheads have advantage on Stealth checks made in natural terrain.

Traits.Name: Paranoid Frenzy
Traits.Content: When reduced to half HP, Melonheads may enter a frenzy, gaining a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage.

Actions.Name: Puppet Snap
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, dealing 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Echoing Fright (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Melonhead releases a high-pitched wail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) sonic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one, and is deafened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Frenzied Flurry
Actions.Content: In a sudden burst of panic, the Melonhead attacks twice in one turn. Each melee attack is +4 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. After this action, the Melonhead must succeed in a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.
